structuredData.headline: EPA Is Phasing Out Methylene Chloride in Industrial Adhesives: What You Need to Know and Do
structuredData.description: Understanding the EPA's Methylene Chloride Phase-Out Methylene chloride, a powerful solvent commonly used in industrial adhesives and other applications, is being phased out by the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) due to its significant health risks.

structuredData.headline: Product Spotlight: Forzabond CA GEL
structuredData.description: Forzabond CA GEL is one of our specialty adhesives, a high viscosity, surface insensitive cyanoacrylate (AKA superglue, instant adhesive) in a thicker gel form. It is generally applied to porous surfaces where a thin liquid would be absorbed too quickly.
structuredData.keywords: Product Spotlight, adhesives, industrial, manufacturing, product spotlight: forzabond ca gel

structuredData.headline: Product Spotlight: ForzaSEAL™ OS2

structuredData.headline: Product Spotlight: Forzabond OA4

structuredData.headline: Product Spotlight: Forzabond H805
structuredData.description: Forzabond H805 is one of our hotmelt adhesives. It is an aggressive PSA (pressure-sensitive) hotmelt which is often used to replace PUR hotmelts. H805 can bond vinyls, polypropylene and other difficult-to-bond substrates.
structuredData.keywords: Product Spotlight, adhesives, industrial, manufacturing, product spotlight: forzabond h805
